freindE.p: Bestfriend love is a different type of love
True friends are always there for you
Dear bestfriend i honestly don't know what i would do without you.
Never Forget your Friends when you are in a Relationship.
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
The best mirror is an old friend.

A true friend sees the first tear,
 catches the second, 
and stops the third.
Sitting next to you doing absolutely nothing means absolutely everything to me.

Sometimes your best friends understands you better than you understand yourself.

I love every moment spent with you!
There’s something about childhood friends that you just can’t replace.
The better part of one’s life consists of his friendships.
Those who stand with you when you are alone are called best friends

A good friend knows all your best stories. 
A best friend has lived them with you.

It is not important to make million of friends. 
It is important to have one friend who will stand by your side when millions are against.
A friend shares the good times and helps out by listening during the bad times.

"Friendship" is the part of "heart",
 "Heart" is the part of "feelings" 
"Feelings" is the symbol of "care"
& "Care" is the special word for "FRIENDS"

True friends are like diamonds, 
precious and rare,
 false friends are like autumn leaves,
 found everywhere.

My friend my money,
 I give my money to my friend,
 finally I lose my money and my friend.

Love is not only made for lovers, 
it is also for friends who love each other better than lovers. 
a true friend is very hard to find,
 difficult to leave and impossible to forget.

Friendship is a language spoken by heart, not written on paper, 
not given by pledge,
it is a promise renewed every time we get in touch. .

Medicines and friendships cure our problems.
 The main difference is that friendships don’t have an expiry date.

A friend will always make you smile, 
specially when you don’t want to.
People with socially awkward personality tend to be more loyal and faithfull to their friends when in a relationship.

 You laugh,
 I laugh. You cry, 
I cry. You jump off a bridge, 
I get on my boat and save your retarded ass.

you really haven’t learned anything

 Because Both Are Helpful To Remove Our Sorrows and Pain. 
But Difference Of Both Of Them is Friends Have No Expiry Date.

but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.

much appreciated Happy Friendship Day

 we will remember not the words of our enemies,

act like it all the time,

somebody that’s always understood, 
who’s always accepted me,
who’s always cared.

that’s priceless.

it is a decision we make, 
and it is given to somebody who deserves it…

I miss the talks we had, 
I miss the good times we had,
I miss the friend I had…

because you know it would last longer or even forever..
